title: Energy conservation - electrons with pd ratio of 4

content.question: An electron is accelerated from rest through a potential difference of <math alttext="delta uppercase V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>, reaching a speed of <math alttext="lowercase v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>. A different electron is accelerated from rest through a potential difference of <math alttext="4 times delta uppercase V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>, reaching a speed of <math alttext="lowercase v sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>. The ratio <math alttext="the fraction with numerator lowercase v sub 2, and denominator lowercase v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math> is

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
